property.name: Ability
property.value: On your turn, you may look at the amount of money on any one group except an Illuminati.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Weird group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Government group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Weird group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Draw one extra card each turn.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card immediately after the dice are rolled on any attempt (by any player) to destroy, control, or neutralize. That roll is immediately changed, retroactively, to a 2.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Peaceful group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play at any time to move any Artifact to the uncontrolled area. If an attack was in progress, that Artifact has no effect.

property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Conservative group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +4 to any attack against Coffee Shops

property.name: Ability
property.value: +2 on any attempt to destroy any group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Once per turn, you may spend your Illuminati action to discard all uncontrolled Groups and draw an equal number of cards. Any Special cards you draw become yours. The Groups that you draw become the new uncontrolled area.

property.name: Ability
property.value: The group that controls the Bloggers gets +10 to defend itself against any attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +10 to any attempt to control an Artifact owned by a rival. Or play at any time except during an attack to take control of an uncontrolled Artifact.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Liberal group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +4 on any attack on the Phone Company, and vice versa.

property.value: +5 on any attempt to destroy Bird Flu.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Fanatic group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Once per turn, owner can remove an alignment of any other Group in play; change lasts for that turn only.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +5 for direct control of Elvis Impersonators, or vice versa.

property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Criminal group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Add 2 to the Power (and Transferrable Power) of your Illuminati.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Fanatic group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +4 to any attempt to destroy a Weird or Fanatic group (+8 if it's both). Discordia's puppets are not immune to direct attacks from the Deprogrammers.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Straight group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Treat this group as Conservative if it attempts to attack a Conservative group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: This group cannot be destroyed, but any attack to destroy its master gets a +2.

property.name: Ability
property.value: When FEMA makes or aids an attack, that attack automatically fails on a roll of 9 or more.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +2 to any attempt to destroy any group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: This group takes on all the alignments of its master for all purposes, including victory conditions.

property.name: Ability
property.value: When a group is destroyed by any player, you may immediately spend 1MB from your Illuminati and move the group to the uncontrolled area. It still counts as a destroyed group for the player who destroyed it, and may be destroyed again.

property.name: Ability
property.value: It sees all. You may abolish the privilege on any attack by spending your next turn's Illuminati attack. You may not do this more than once per round unless you get more than one Illuminati attack per turn. Note that you still get two actions next turn... you just can't use your Illuminati for one of them.

property.name: Ability
property.value: '+4 to any attempt to control School Boards.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Peaceful group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Gold to fuel the schemes of the Illuminati! The Midas Mill has an Income of 3, which is placed directly on the controlling Illuminati.

property.name: Ability
property.value: No Government group can control, or aid an attempt to control, the Minutemen.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card immediately after the dice are rolled on any attempt (by any player) to destroy, control, or neutralize. That roll is immediately changed, retroactively, to a 12.

property.value: '+4 on any attempt to control an Artifact.

property.name: Ability
property.value: '+3 on any attempt to destroy any Communist group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: All Fanatic groups are treated as the same alignment for the purpose of any attack you make. Fanatic gets +4 to control or neutralize Fanatic but -4 to destroy it.

property.value: Ninety Minutes has +10 resistance to Straight or Government groups.

property.value: On your turn, you may discard any card (Group or Special) and get an extra action. Discarded Groups, and any groups they controlled, go to the uncontrolled area.

property.value: Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Communist group.

card.name: Secrets Man Was Not Meant To Know

property.name: cardName
property.value: Secrets Man Was Not Meant To Know

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card when any other special card is played, for ANY purpose. That card is immediately neutralized; it has no effect. Both cards are discarded.

property.name: Ability
property.value: All your groups have +2 defense against any attack to control.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Any time a rival takes control of any of your Groups, you may immediately take the top discarded Special.

property.name: Ability
property.value: You have +4 on any attempt to control, neutralize, or destroy any Fanatic group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: '+2 to any attempt to destroy another group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: On your turn only, you may pay 3MB from your Illuminati and move any uncontrolled group to the discard stack, It does not count as destroyed.
